snippet.title: Plague Inc: Evolved Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the official launch trailer for Plague Inc: Evolved - developed by Ndemic Creations. Now out on Steam - you can get it here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/246620/

Can you infect the world? Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself. 

Plague Inc: Evolved is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation which is evolving onto PC via Steam Early Access (with Mac and Linux to follow). Plague Inc: Evolved combines the original critically acclaimed gameplay of Plague Inc. on mobile with significant, all-new features for PC: Infectious Multiplayer, Contagious Content Creator, Blinding Graphics, Deadly Data and much more!

More information here: http://www.plagueincevolved.com 

For updates and news - follow me
Twitter - https://twitter.com/NdemicCreations
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc
